forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers late. Low 11C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
